entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then clearing. Local blowing snow early this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light early this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 19 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
